>So said Ranjeet Sahay on 2003-05-08 --------------------
>Hi,
>
>Is there a way of creating report with JUnit which displays how many
>tests passed
>and how many failed(with possibly more details). The GUI is not
>sufficient for reporting tests (which may be over 5000 running over
>hours).
>
>I have logs (using log4j) to look at but becomes awfull searching for
>failures in maze of results. I have seen stuffs at IBM sites and also
>can be made using
>ant junitreport. But is there more easier way of making reports using
>JUnit(add-on may be).
>
>Desparately look for easier way for reporting.

Ant with JUnitReport. Have fun.


J. B. Rainsberger,
